tourBios.carHigh:
2012: Made the cut in five of 12 starts during the year. Earned his second career top-10, with a T9 at the Utah Championship. Was inside the top 10 after each round at Willow Creek CC, posting sub-par scores every day. 

2011: Made the cut in both of his Web.com Tour startsâthe Stadion Classic at UGA and the Cox Classic. Closed his season on the Canadian Tour with five consecutive top-25 finishes. 

2009: Made the cut at the Albertsons Boise Open, his only start of the year...Earned his professional win, at the Canadian Tour Championship in Ontario. Parred the first hole of a playoff to defeat Lucas Lee of Brazil. 

2008: Made the cut in three of six starts on the Web.com Tour with a T8 at the Price Cutter Charity Championship and a T12 at the Livermore Valley Wine Country Championship his best finishes. 

2007: Missed the cut at the Canadian Open, his only Tour-related start...Named the Canadian Tour Rookie of the Year after making eight cuts in 14 starts. 2006: Missed the cut as an amateur at the Canadian Open. 2005: Missed the cut at the Alberta Classic. 2003: Missed the cut at the Alberta Calgary Classic.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Four-year letterman at the University of Denver, where he played for former Web.com Tour member Eric Hoos (winner of the 1991 Wichita Charity Classic). College teammate of former Web.com Tour member Barrett Jarosch. As a senion in 2006 he became the first Pioneer to qualify as an individual for the NCAA Championship. Shot a school-record, 10-under 62 in the opening round of the 2006 Taylor Made Barona Cup, which he went on to win. Won three times in college. Set several single-season and career records at Denver and still holds records in 12 of 18 scoring categories.

tourBios.otherInfo: Won the Barona Collegiate Cup Individual title and the Pioneer Classic while at the University of Denver.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Canada was 1st in 2009 at the Canadian Tour Championship.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T99th in Career Cuts on the PGA TOUR Canada.
